episodes.synopsis: With his cartel bringing in an estimated $60 million a day, Pablo Escobar rises to become one of the richest but most ruthless men in the world.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Ruthless drug lord Pablo Escobar continues to build his multibillion-dollar empire, bribing or killing those who stand his way.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Los tiempos de Pablo Escobar
video.synopsis: Featuring never-before-seen images, personal testimonies and more, this is the story of one of the most notorious drug smugglers of all time.
